menuitem.action: dialog==On self-approving a RD Cat 2 document - set Readers / review date

condition.value: cd_common_ref_model where category = 2 and domain in ('Clinical','Non-Clinical','Quality','Regulatory/Administrative','Ad Promo','Labeling','Safety','Regulatory Correspondence')

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (SELECT * FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT i_folder_id FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN(SELECT i_folder_id FROM cd_submission_element WHERE r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and object_name not in ('index.xml','index-md5.txt'))) and object_name !='util')

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (SELECT * FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT i_folder_id FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN(SELECT i_folder_id FROM cd_submission_element WHERE r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and object_name not in ('index.xml','index-md5.txt'))) and object_name !='util')

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (SELECT * FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT i_folder_id FROM dm_folder WHERE r_object_id IN(SELECT i_folder_id FROM cd_submission_element WHERE r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and object_name not in ('index.xml','index-md5.txt'))) and object_name !='util')
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where wf_is_in_workflow=true and r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)')

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists(SELECT * FROM dm_workflow WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT r_workflow_id FROM dmi_package WHERE ANY r_component_id = '$value(r_object_id)') AND r_runtime_state='1' AND object_name LIKE 'Cat 1 GMP withdrawal%') or exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and a_status = 'Effective' and can_be_withdrawn = true and planned_withdraw_date is not nulldate)
